# lyne-heading


<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Usage

### Usage

Use it like this: `<lyne-title level="1" text="My title text"></lyne-title>`



## Properties

| Property         | Attribute         | Description                                                                                                                                                                                   | Type                                     | Default                |
| ---------------- | ----------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- | ---------------------- |
| `level`          | `level`           | Title level                                                                                                                                                                                   | `"1" \| "2" \| "3" \| "4" \| "5" \| "6"` | `'1'`                  |
| `rtl`            | `rtl`             | Simulate behaviour in rtl context                                                                                                                                                             | `boolean`                                | `undefined`            |
| `text`           | `text`            | Text for the Title                                                                                                                                                                            | `string`                                 | `'Default title text'` |
| `visualLevel`    | `visual-level`    | Visual level for the title                                                                                                                                                                    | `"1" \| "2" \| "3" \| "4" \| "5" \| "6"` | `'1'`                  |
| `visuallyHidden` | `visually-hidden` | Sometimes we need a title in the markup to present a proper hierarchy to the screenreaders while we do not want to let that title appear visually. In this case we set visuallyHidden to true | `boolean`                                | `undefined`            |


----------------------------------------------
